alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua, west central Union, southern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, or near Ichetucknee Spring, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Trenton, Bell, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, High Springs, Fort White, Wellborn, Obrien and Mcalpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
